typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		country as string,
		indicator as string,
		date as date,
		year_week as string,
		value as double,
		source as string,
		url as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> HospitalAdmissionSource
source(output(
		country as string,
		country_code_2_digit as string,
		country_code_3_digit as string,
		continent as string,
		population as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CountryLookup
source(output(
		date_key as date,
		date as date,
		year as string,
		month as short,
		day as short,
		day_name as string,
		day_of_year as short,
		week_of_month as short,
		week_of_year as string,
		month_name as string,
		year_month as integer,
		year_week as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> DIMlookupSource
HospitalAdmissionSource select(mapColumn(
		country,
		indicator,
		Repoerted_date = date,
		year_week,
		value,
		source
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectFromSource
SelectFromSource, CountryLookup lookup(SelectFromSource@country == CountryLookup@country,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupCountry
LookupCountry select(mapColumn(
		country = SelectFromSource@country,
		indicator,
		Repoerted_date,
		year_week,
		value,
		source,
		country_code_2_digit,
		country_code_3_digit,
		continent,
		population
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectReqFromLookup
SelectReqFromLookup split(indicator == 'Daily ICU occupancy'|| indicator== "Daily hospital occupancy",
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(DailyHosAdmissionsReport, WeeklyHosAdmissionsReport)
DIMlookupSource aggregate(groupBy(Reported_Week_Year = year + '-W' + lpad(week_of_year,2,'0')),
	Start_Week_day = min(date),
		End_week_day = max(date)) ~> Aggregate1
ConditionalSplit1@DailyHosAdmissionsReport, Aggregate1 join(year_week == Reported_Week_Year,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinStartEndDaily
ConditionalSplit1@WeeklyHosAdmissionsReport, Aggregate1 join(year_week == Reported_Week_Year,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinStartEndWeekly
JoinStartEndDaily pivot(groupBy(country,
		Repoerted_date,
		year_week,
		country_code_2_digit,
		country_code_3_digit,
		continent,
		population,
		Reported_Week_Year,
		Start_Week_day,
		End_week_day),
	pivotBy(indicator, ['Daily ICU occupancy', 'Daily hospital occupancy']),
	Count = sum(value),
	columnNaming: '$V_$N',
	lateral: true) ~> PivotDailyindicator
JoinStartEndWeekly pivot(groupBy(country,
		year_week,
		country_code_2_digit,
		country_code_3_digit,
		population,
		continent,
		Start_Week_day,
		End_week_day),
	pivotBy(indicator, ['Weekly new ICU admissions per 100k', 'Weekly new hospital admissions per 100k']),
	Counts = sum(value),
	columnNaming: '$V_$N',
	lateral: true) ~> PivotWeeklyindicator
PivotWeeklyindicator sort(asc(country, true),
	desc(year_week, true)) ~> SortCountryWeek
PivotDailyindicator sort(asc(country, true),
	desc(Repoerted_date, true)) ~> SortCountryDate
SortCountryDate select(mapColumn(
		country,
		continent,
		country_code_2_digit,
		country_code_3_digit,
		Reported_date = Repoerted_date,
		Reported_Week_Year,
		population,
		Start_Week_day,
		End_week_day,
		{Daily ICU occupancy_Count},
		{Daily hospital occupancy_Count}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectForDailySink
SortCountryWeek select(mapColumn(
		country,
		year_week,
		country_code_2_digit,
		country_code_3_digit,
		population,
		continent,
		Start_Week_day,
		End_week_day,
		{Weekly new ICU admissions per 100k_Counts},
		{Weekly new hospital admissions per 100k_Counts}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectForWeeklySink
SelectForDailySink sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SinkDailyHospitalAdmission
SelectForWeeklySink sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SinkWeeklyHospitalAdmission
